samples.instruction: Fine Arts ‡Æ™‡Æü‡Æø‡Æö‡Øç‡Æö‡Ææ future ‡Æé‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æ©?
samples.current_output: BFA (Bachelor of Fine Arts): 4 years. Specializations: Painting, Sculpture, Applied Art, Graphic Design. Colleges: Govt College of Fine Arts Chennai, Kumbakonam. Jobs: Art galleries, Advertising agencies, Film industry (Art director), Teaching, Freelance artist. Digital art growing field. Salary varies widely: ‚Çπ15,000-1 lakh+ based on skill and reputation. Portfolio and networking crucial.

samples.instruction: Women entrepreneurs-‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ special schemes ‡Æâ‡Æ≥‡Øç‡Æ≥‡Æ§‡Ææ?
samples.current_output: Women-specific schemes: 1) Stand-Up India - ‚Çπ10 lakh to ‚Çπ1 crore (SC/ST/Women) 2) Mudra Yojana - Women priority 3) TANSIDCO - Women Entrepreneurship Programme 4) State Industries Department - 30% subsidy 5) TNCDW (Corporation for Development of Women) - interest-free loans. Training: TNSDC women skill programmes, TRYSEM. Self-help groups ‡ÆÆ‡ØÇ‡Æ≤‡ÆÆ‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Øç loans available. Apply: Respective department websites.

samples.instruction: Government hostel-‡Æ≤‡Øç seat ‡Æé‡Æ™‡Øç‡Æ™‡Æü‡Æø ‡Æï‡Æø‡Æü‡Øà‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ‡ÆÆ‡Øç?
samples.current_output: Process: 1) Apply through college/department 2) Priority: Distance from home, family income, caste category 3) Documents: Income certificate, nativity, distance proof 4) BC/MBC/SC/ST welfare hostels - apply through respective departments 5) Working women's hostel - separate application. Fees: Government hostel very subsidized (‚Çπ100-500/month). Free for eligible SC/ST. Apply early - seats limited. Waiting list exists.

samples.instruction: Online resources effectively use panrathu eppadi?
samples.current_output: Best free resources: 1) NPTEL - IIT professors lectures 2) SWAYAM - certificate courses 3) Khan Academy - basics strong 4) YouTube - Physics Wallah, Unacademy 5) MIT OpenCourseWare - advanced topics 6) Coursera audit mode - free learning 7) Google Scholar - research papers 8) LibGen - textbooks (use responsibly). Tip: Schedule online study time, avoid distraction rabbit holes. Download for offline access.

samples.instruction: Domicile certificate vs Nativity certificate - ‡Æé‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æ© difference?
samples.current_output: Nativity: Born in Tamil Nadu ‡Æé‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æ±‡ØÅ prove. Issued by: Tahsildar. For: Reservation benefits, state quota seats. Domicile: Residing in state for specified period (usually 5+ years). For: Some central institution admissions. Both different! Don't confuse. TN admissions mostly need: Nativity OR studied in TN for specific years (varies by counselling). Documents: Birth certificate, school TC, Aadhaar showing TN address.

samples.instruction: Income certificate enge vaanguvadhu? Online-la apply pannalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Online apply: www.tnedistrict.tn.gov.in or e-Sevai centres. Offline: VAO ‚Üí RI ‚Üí Tahsildar. Documents: Aadhaar, ration card, employment proof (if any), self-declaration for non-employed. Time: 7-15 working days. Fee: ‚Çπ10-50. Validity: Usually 1 year, some schemes accept older. Types: Annual income certificate, income certificate for specific scheme. Tip: Apply in advance before scholarship deadline.

samples.instruction: HDFC Bank Parivartan's ECSS scholarship enna?
samples.current_output: Educational Crisis Scholarship Support (ECSS): Financial crisis-la ulla students-ku. Amount: Up to ‚Çπ75,000. Eligibility: Family crisis (death, illness, job loss), income ‚Çπ6 lakh kizha, 55%+ marks. Covers: School/College fee. Apply: www.hdfcbankecss.com. Documents: Crisis proof, income proof, marks, Aadhaar. One-time emergency support.

samples.instruction: College-ku poga budget illa da. Free-ya padikka mudiyuma?
samples.current_output: Mudiyum da! Government colleges-la fees romba kammi - yearly ‚Çπ1000-5000 only. Scholarship apply pannu - BC/MBC/SC/ST full scholarship kidaikkum. Distance education - IGNOU, TNOU almost free. Skill training - TNSDC 100% free. Padikka aasai irundhaa vazhi irukku!

samples.instruction: Bank Jobs-‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ ‡Æé‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æ©‡ØÜ‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æ© exams ‡Æá‡Æ∞‡ØÅ‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ? Eligibility ‡Æé‡Æ©‡Øç‡Æ©?
samples.current_output:
**Bank Exams Overview:**

**Major Bank Exams:**

**1. IBPS PO (Probationary Officer):**
- Posts: Public Sector Banks PO
- Eligibility: Any Degree
- Age: 20-30 years
- Salary: ‚Çπ52,000-67,000/month (starting)

**2. IBPS Clerk:**
- Posts: Clerical cadre in PSBs
- Eligibility: Any Degree
- Age: 20-28 years
- Salary: ‚Çπ28,000-35,000/month

**3. IBPS SO (Specialist Officer):**
- Posts: IT Officer, Law Officer, HR, Marketing
- Eligibility: Relevant Degree/PG
- Age: 20-30 years

**4. SBI PO:**
- Posts: State Bank of India PO
- Eligibility: Any Degree
- Age: 21-30 years
- Most prestigious bank exam!

**5. SBI Clerk:**
- Posts: SBI Clerical
- Eligibility: Any Degree
- Age: 20-28 years

**6. RBI Grade B:**
- Posts: Reserve Bank of India Officer
- Eligibility: PG/Degree with 60%
- Age: 21-30 years
- Highest salary!

**7. RRB (Regional Rural Banks):**
- IBPS RRB PO
- IBPS RRB Clerk
- For rural area banking

**Common Eligibility:**
- Nationality: Indian
- Computer Knowledge: Basic required
- Language: Local language knowledge preferred

**Age Relaxation:**
| Category | Relaxation |
|----------|------------|
| SC/ST | +5 years |
| OBC | +3 years |
| PwD | +10 years |
| Ex-Servicemen | As per rules |

**Apply:** ibps.in, sbi.co.in, rbi.org.in

samples.instruction: Sandwich pattern diploma enna? Regular-lirundhu enna viththiyaasam?
samples.current_output: Sandwich Diploma: Theory + Industrial training combined. Pattern: 1st year theory ‚Üí 2nd year industry (6 months paid training) ‚Üí 3rd year theory. Benefits: 1) Real work experience 2) Stipend during training ‚Çπ5,000-8,000/month 3) Job placement better 4) Industry connections. Offered at: NTTF, Central Polytechnics, select government colleges. Duration: Same 3 years. Highly recommended for practical learning.

samples.instruction: Bank exam-‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ prepare ‡ÆÜ‡Æµ‡Æ§‡ØÅ ‡Æé‡Æ™‡Øç‡Æ™‡Æü‡Æø? SBI/IBPS difference?
samples.current_output: Banking exams: IBPS - Public sector banks (PNB, Canara, etc). SBI - Separate recruitment. Pattern similar: Prelims + Mains + Interview. Sections: English, Reasoning, Quantitative, General Awareness, Computer. Preparation: 1) RS Aggarwal for Maths/Reasoning 2) Word Power Made Easy for English 3) Banking Awareness - Arihant 4) Daily mock tests. Difference: SBI slightly tougher, more vacancies. Start with IBPS, apply SBI also.

samples.instruction: Ore nerathula pala scholarships-ku apply seiyalama?
samples.current_output: Aam, aanaal rules parunga: 1) Different sources (central + state + private) - usually OK 2) Same department multiple schemes - one only 3) NSP-la one scholarship per year rule ulladhu 4) Disclose other scholarships if asked. Strategy: Government first (guaranteed), then private (competitive). Keep track of all applications in a spreadsheet. Renewal applications separate apply.

samples.instruction: Government Polytechnic college-la admission eppadi?
samples.current_output: DOTE counselling: 1) www.tndte.gov.in-la online registration 2) 10th marks upload 3) Choice filling - college + branch 4) Rank list based on marks 5) Counselling date - certificate verification 6) Seat allotment. Fee: Government polytechnic ‚Çπ1,500-3,000/year. Reservation applicable. Cutoff marks: Top colleges-ku 400+ (out of 500).

samples.instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: Arts padichaa future illai
samples.current_output: Fact: Fact: Arts graduates options: IAS/IPS (UPSC - Arts background preferred), Banking, Teaching, Law, Journalism, Civil Services, HR, Social Work. Many IAS toppers are Arts graduates. Salary depends on job not degree. BA + competitive exam preparation = excellent career. Arts graduates excel in UPSC due to writing skills. Don't underestimate humanities!

samples.instruction: Polytechnic Diploma enna? ITI-lirundhu enna viththiyaasam?
samples.current_output: Difference: ITI = Trade training (practical focused), Diploma = Technical education (theory + practical). Diploma: 3 years after 10th. Branches: Mechanical, Civil, Electrical, Electronics, Computer Science, Automobile. Job level: Supervisor/Junior Engineer. ITI: Technician/Operator level. Salary difference: Diploma holders ‚Çπ5,000-10,000 more starting. Higher studies: Diploma ‚Üí B.E. lateral entry possible.

samples.instruction: En ponnu NEET-la fail aayitta - aduthu enna vazhi?
samples.current_output: Discourage pannaadheenga. Options: Next year NEET retry, BSc Nursing/Allied Health Sciences, BDS (dental), BAMS/BHMS (alternative medicine), BSc Life Sciences. NEET-kku 8 attempts varai try pannalam. Age limit: 25 years.

samples.instruction: AICTE scholarship engineering students-ku enna ulladhu?
samples.current_output: AICTE Scholarships: 1) Pragati - Women in technical education, ‚Çπ50,000/year 2) Saksham - Differently abled students, ‚Çπ50,000/year 3) Swanath - Orphan students 4) PM's Special Scholarship - J&K students. Additional: GATE qualified students-ku ‚Çπ12,400/month scholarship ME/M.Tech-la. Apply: www.aicte-india.org. Income limit: ‚Çπ8 lakh/year.

samples.instruction: ITI/Diploma holders-ku government jobs evvalavu?
samples.current_output: ITI holder jobs: 1) Railway Technician 2) TNEB Wireman/Lineman 3) Defence (Technical) 4) Ordinance Factory 5) PSU technician posts. Diploma holder jobs: 1) SSC JE (Junior Engineer) 2) RRB JE 3) TNPSC JA/AE 4) PWD Junior Engineer 5) PSU engineers. Salary: ITI ‚Çπ20,000-35,000, Diploma ‚Çπ35,000-60,000. Prepare: Technical subjects + General knowledge. Many vacancies yearly.
